metadata.name: Antibirth Runes
metadata.description:
In the Antibirth mod, there were 4 runes that were cut from Repentance along with 2 more runes that were unused. This mod brings them back!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/tp9LIOS.png[/img]
[h1]𝐀𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐫𝐭𝐡 𝐑𝐮𝐧𝐞𝐬[/h1] [list] [*]Features EID & Encyclopedia support [*]Features Magic Chalk Support [/list] [u]___________________________________[/u]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/X4nGns7.png[/img] All runes are unlockable by completing the stated challenge [img]https://i.imgur.com/X4nGns7.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/e1tGcWD.png[/img] [u]Gebo[/u] = Spawns a donation machine (Bloody Mary) [img]https://i.imgur.com/j1uZxxz.png[/img] [u]Kenaz[/u] = Poisons all enemies in a room (Scat Man) [img]https://i.imgur.com/D1oVdwF.png[/img] [u]Fehu[/u] = Turns all pickup in a room into coins (Cantripped) [img]https://i.imgur.com/xaxZPnB.png[/img] [u]Othala[/u] = Gives Isaac a random item that he already holds (Seeing Double) [img]https://i.imgur.com/qmJ8aLd.png[/img] [u]Ingwaz[/u] = Opens all chests in a room (Baptism by Fire) [img]https://i.imgur.com/J43GFfs.png[/img] [u]Sowilo[/u] = Revives all enemies killed in a room (Red Redemption)
[u]___________________________________[/u]
(Note: Gebo is currently a placeholder effect because the true effect it does in Antibirth is impossible with the current modding api. Pls fix kil :( )
[img]https://i.imgur.com/0YXOqPH.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐫[/u] = Sillst [*][u]𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = kittenchilly, BrakeDude [*][u]𝐒𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = Sillst, Michael¿? [*][u]𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬[/u] = Kotry, BrakeDude [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = kittenchilly, Sillst [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/3en8OyU.png[/img] [code]Aether, Akad, anchikai., Blind the Bound Demon, Blixy, BrakeDude, cat,,, Firework, fly_6, Goncholito, jubbalub, kittenchilly, Luigi124, Merlin, Michael¿?, Royal, Sillst, skippy[/code]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SlXbHql.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xd2eafr.png[/img] [code][u]_Kilburn[/u] - For the original rune ideas [u]All of you[/u] - For checking us out and supporting us :)[/code]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GKVOZZ8.png[/img]
